name: seqviz
description: A framework agnostic DNA viewer for sequences or files (gb, fasta, etc) with auto-feature annotation
author: Lattice Automation (https://latticeautomation.com/)

scripts.build: webpack --config webpack.config.js --display-error-details --progress --color --verbose && node execXML.js ./README.md && node execXML.js ./CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md && cp dist/seqviz.min.js demo/semantic-ui/public/ && cp dist/seqviz.min.js demo/simple-ui/public/
scripts.deploy: PKG_VERSION=$(node -pe "require('./package.json').version") && aws s3 cp dist/seqviz.min.js s3://lattice-cdn-s3/libs/seqviz/"$PKG_VERSION"/ && cd demo/semantic-ui && npm install && npm run deploy && cd ../..
scripts.patch:premajor: npm run patch major && npm run patch prerelease --
scripts.patch:preminor: npm run patch minor && npm run patch prerelease --
scripts.patch:prepatch: npm run patch patch && npm run patch prerelease --
scripts.release:major: npm run patch:major && npm run build && git add . && git commit --amend -C HEAD && npm run deploy
scripts.release:minor: npm run patch:minor && npm run build && git add . && git commit --amend -C HEAD && npm run deploy
scripts.release:patch: npm run patch:patch && npm run build && git add . && git commit --amend -C HEAD && npm run deploy
scripts.release:prerelease: npm run patch:prerelease && npm run build && git add . && git commit --amend -C HEAD && npm run deploy
scripts.release:premajor: npm run patch:premajor && npm run build && git add . && git commit --amend -C HEAD && npm run deploy
scripts.release:preminor: npm run patch:preminor && npm run build && git add . && git commit --amend -C HEAD && npm run deploy
scripts.release:prepatch: npm run patch:prepatch && npm run build && git add . && git commit --amend -C HEAD && npm run deploy
